snippet: Arkansas Attorney General Dustin McDaniel said on Friday he would appeal a federal judge's decision striking down a state law that bans most abortions starting at 12 weeks of pregnancy, one of the most stringent such statutes in the United States....

headline.print_headline: Arkansas to Appeal Ruling on Abortion Restriction Law
headline.main: Arkansas to Appeal Ruling on Abortion Restriction Law

lead_paragraph: Arkansas Attorney General Dustin McDaniel said on Friday he would appeal a federal judge's decision striking down a state law that bans most abortions starting at 12 weeks of pregnancy, one of the most stringent such statutes in the United States.
